inclusion.criterion: Documented atherosclerotic stenosis in carotid artery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Statin treatment is indicated, following ANSM guidelines (French drug agency)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Ischemic stroke/TIA due to arterial dissection
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Cardiac source of embolism (e.g., mitral stenosis, endomyocardial fibrosis) without documented atherosclerotic stenosis
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has recent ischemic stroke and documented atherosclerotic stenosis in carotid artery. Statin treatment is indicated, following ANSM guidelines (French drug agency). Patient does not have ischemic stroke/TIA due to arterial dissection or cardiac source of embolism without documented atherosclerotic stenosis.
